IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MCPHERSON COUNTY COMMUNITY FOUNDATION SERVES THE COMMON GOOD FOR ITS RESIDENTS, BUILDING STRONG COMMUNITIES BY ENGAGING PEOPLE IN PHILANTHROPY AND DEVELOPING A PERMANENT ENDOWMENT TO PROVIDE RESOURCES, NOW AND FOR GENERATIONS TO COME.

IRS990.Desc: OPERATIONS OF A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION PROVIDING A RESOURCE FOR ENDOWMENTS TO BE GRANTED TO OTHER NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS IN THE COMMUNITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DEVELOPMENT OF OPERATING PROGRAMS AND PROVIDING VARIOUS TRAININGS FOR COMMUNITY ORGANIZATIONS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: HELD FOR OTHERS UNDER AGENCY TRANSACTIONS

OtherLiabilitiesOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN LIFE INSURANCE POLICY
HELD FOR OTHERS UNDER AGENCY TRANSACTIONS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES PRESCRIBE THE ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES AND A RECOGNITION THRESHOLD AND MEASUREMENT ATTRIBUTE FOR THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT RECOGNITION AND MEASUREMENT OF A TAX POSITION TAKEN OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN A TAX RETURN. THERE WAS NO EFFECT ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS A RESULT OF ADOPTING THIS INTERPRETATION AS THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES IT DOES NOT HAVE ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS REFLECTED IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. TAX YEARS THAT REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION IN THE ORGANIZATION'S MAJOR JURISDICTIONS ARE FOR THE YEARS ENDED AUGUST 31, 2018, 2017, AND 2016.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF ASSETS HELD IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER UNITRUST 28,589.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MCPHERSON COUNTY COMMUNITY FOUNDATION MONITORS USE OF GRANT FUNDS THROUGH SIGNED AGREEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NOMINATING COMMITTEE NOMINATES POTENTIAL BOARD MEMBERS. THESE ARE THEN VOTED ON AND APPROVED BY THE REST OF THE BOARD

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTE AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ADMINISTRAVE ASSISTANT REVIEWS ALL BOARD MEMBER'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST SCHEDULES ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD REVIEWS COMPENSATION PACKAGES AND COMPARES TO OTHER SIMILAR ENTITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS REQUIRED TO BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST IN PERSON.
